component_notes: Too many type sizes and styles at once can spoil any layout. A typographic scale has a limited set of type sizes that work well together along with the layout grid.
Raised buttons are rectangular-shaped buttons. They may be used inline. They lift and display ink reactions on press.
component_code: <Button variant='raised' color='primary' className={classes.button}>Primary</Button><Button variant='raised' color='secondary' className={classes.button}>  Secondary</Button><Button variant='raised' color='secondary' disabled className={classes.button}>  Disabled</Button>
